message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,500. I believe it will be very valuable for you, and this is a fair price.
Thank you for considering me for the product. I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere within my budget. My maximum willingness to pay is $10,000.
Bob, I understand your position, but I know the value of this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your effort to meet my budget constraints, but I still believe I should not exceed $10,000 for this product. I would like to stick to my original offer of $10,000.
